description: This app has not been supported for over a YEAR! Unless you want to fix the bugs yourself as OS updates move forward, I would not recommend using this software.

This is for the Flathub version. The program installs and launches, but is not able to find price data for well-known investments: F, GE, TXN, etc. 
Use the Snap version which does work.
summary: Installs and launches, but does not import stock data
